name: Navgatorb
description:
Congratulations!You are eligible to take your role as part of the NAVIGATORB project.

Our newest probe ORBIS has become operational, finally  giving us opportunity to explore the perilous bounds of LIMBOUS ZONE.

Engage those regions is not for weak or clumsy operators! We need your wits and ace-like navigational skills.

Your only chance is to fly avoiding the walls and the NEGATIVE SPORES. Its manifestation is common occurrence inside the "ZONE" and you shall avoid those at the cost of our highly regarded probe and of course your own life..

We expect your best reflexes and impervious will! Go further and fast into endless unexplored regions, become the best ORBIS NAVIGATOR.

FEATURING: 

. 5 Endless levels to play ;

. Unobtrusive menus, jump fast into action ;

. Highly replayable skill-based gameplay ;

. 1 button gameplay ;
